page.title: Shrike Title
page.t: The Skytte is the pride of Aurora Casinos chief engineer Nyxus who personally oversaw the project that led to this heavy turreted fighter, nicknamed "the shredder" as its turrets are a terrifying threat to hostile fightercraft.\n\nThis ship sets firepower and durability over speed and agility, trusting in its turrets and strong shielding.
